text: In the new outer flood bypass for the capital regionー
There was a group of soldiers that seemed out of place in the underground zone that the Armed Refugees had now claimed as their territory.

name: UFS Soldier
text: "Stupid" lost "Tango"! I repeat! "Stupid" lost "Tango"ー
"Stupid" meant the Armed Refugees. And "Tango" was code for Taimanin.
In other words, the communication just now had been about how the Armed Refugees had lost the Taimanin they had been tracking.

name: UFS Soldier
text: Fuckers!! Those useless losers...!!
The men clicked their tongues in frustration. They were covert operatives belonging to the UFS's secret service agency "G."
Within secret service agency "G"...
...there was a small number of elite agents produced in the Cyborg Soldier (CS) program...
...and one of them was leading the special covert troops this time.

name: Hestia
text: What're those numbskulls doin' over yonder? There's so many of 'em and they done let the Taimanin escape!?

name: UFS Soldier
text: Captain Hestia!!
The soldiers saluted the strange woman who had appeared in front of them.
Agent "Hestia"ー
She was a powerful female cyborg soldier whose body was modified to resist fire and extreme heat.

name: Hestia
text: Didn't I tell y'all, amateurs can't be trusted. Hey! Our troops're already on the move, right!?

name: UFS Soldier
text: Yes, Captain! Charlie Team is searching for them, but... Should Delta Team join them as well?

name: Hestia
text: I reckon they should! But then we'll be hurtin' fer folks over here. Giddyup and give a holler to base to fetch Mr. Crab!!

name: UFS Soldier
text: Yes, ma'am!!!
The soldier replied briefly and withdrew to contact the base.
And as if stepping in to replace him, another soldier approached Hestia.

name: Hestia
text: What? Somethin' else need seein' to?

name: UFS Soldier
text: A report, Captain!! A squad leader of the Armed Refugees is requesting to meet with you. He says he has a message from Wang.

name: Hestia
text: That good-fer-nothin' nincompoop!? What's he want!? But yeah, let'im in.

name: UFS Soldier
text: Yes, ma'am! Hey, bring those guys in!
Then, a few shabby Armed Refugees walked into the middle of the heavily armed UFS soldiers.

name: Armed Refugee
text: Good day, good day. Sorry for disturbing you.

name: Hestia
text: Yer darn tootin' yer sorry. Thanks to y'all lazy bums draggin' y'all's feet, we're as busy as a cat on a hot tin roof. So, what's this message from Wang?

name: Armed Refugee
text: It's about... it's not something to talk about while standing, so how about we discuss it over tea?

name: Hestia
text: Excuse me!? Y'all lost them darn Taimanin... you ain't the sharpest tool in the shed, are ya!!

name: Hestia
text: If ya get too big fer yer britches, I'll shove some of these here nanomachines up yer rear and roast ya from the inside!!
Hestia threatened the difficult-to-read Armed Refugee.
The female cyborg soldier had access to an ability of unparalleled powerー
She was able to shoot nanomachines from her modified arms to ignite a fire anywhere and then control the flames.

name: Armed Refugee
text: Ah, no, our britches are just fine... A-Alright, here's the message from Wang-sama.

name: Armed Refugee
text: "Why are you guys chasing those Taimanin...?" is what he's asking.

name: Hestia
text: That's what he's itchin' to know? It's because they're fixin' to go after the same target as us.

name: Hestia
text: Takin'em down here oughta be quicker than fightin' against 'em in Yomihara!!

name: Armed Refugee
text: I see. The Taimanin's target and your target are the same...
The Armed Refugee nodded like he understood.
At that moment, Hestia raised her head as though struck with a thought.

name: Hestia
text: ...Hold yer horses. I done explained all that to that blockhead Wang already. Why's he askin' again?

name: Armed Refugee
text: Eh? You did? That's strange, ahaha...

name: Hestia
text: No, no, it ain't strange at all. It might could be that y'all...
The Armed Refugees flinched. They fidgeted restlessly and shuffled about.

name: Hestia
text: It might could be that... Wang is forgetful? This's basic work stuff, ya hear!! Tell'im he oughta take notes!!

name: Armed Refugee
text: Y-Yes! I will let him know...!

name: Hestia
text: Alrighty! That's it then. We're fixin' to head out, so get y'all's rears in gear and get back to work!!
Hestia turned as she spoke, and she and the UFS troops moved deeper inside the underground area.
Thenー

name: Armed Refugee (Me)
text: I was worried for a second... but man, she was easy to fool.

name: Armed Refugee (Shikanosuke)
text: Yeah, I was surprised.

name: Armed Refugee (Sana)
text: Oh man. Scary easy to fool.

name: Armed Refugee (Hebiko)
text: There's a lot of strange people in the UFS as well...
Disguised as Armed Refugees, we whispered to each other.
This was what I had thought of in order to get through the opponent's territory while also being able to gather information.
We had put some of the Armed Refugees who were searching for us to sleep and then taken their clothes to disguise ourselves.
Then we had gotten exactly what we were aiming for. We had been able to get through their territory and also found out why they were after us.

name: Armed Refugee (Me)
text: I didn't expect the UFS to be involved in this... Things are getting confusing.

name: Armed Refugee (Hebiko)
text: She said the target is the same.

name: Armed Refugee (Shikanosuke)
text: Does that have something to do with our mission in Yomihara?
We still didn't know the specific details of our mission, but felt as if we had a vague idea of what it might entail.

name: Armed Refugee (Sana)
text: Huh, so the UFS is after the same target. Sounds like a fun mission♪

name: Armed Refugee (Me)
text: Sana-san, so you're back to spouting stuff off... But if the UFS is giving out a reward, the Armed Refugees won't give up easily.

name: Armed Refugee (Me)
text: ...Which means it might be a good idea for us to wear these clothes until we get to Yomihara.

name: Armed Refugee (Sana)
text: You're right. It'll be easy to get through their territory if we're wearing this.
GRRR...

name: Armed Refugee (Me)
text: Hm? What's that...?
Suddenly, something was growling in the darkness.
And as lookedー
GRR... GRRRR...!

name: Armed Refugee (Hebiko)
text: Hm? A big doggie-chan...?
It was a pack of giant demonic dogs...
They suddenly appeared and surrounded us, baring their vicious fangsー

name: Devil's Dog
text: ROWOW!! ROWOWOWOW ROWOWOWOW!!!

name: Armed Refugee (Me)
text: This is bad!! It's the scent!! Our scents gave us away!!

name: Armed Refugee (Shikanosuke)
text: No waaaaay!! Right in the middle of enemies like these!?
They must have been dogs that the Armed Refugees had kept for hunting.
And although we were wearing the clothes of the Armed Refugees, it seemed like we couldn't deceive the dogs' noses.

name: UFS Soldier
text: What!? What's wrong!?

name: Armed Refugee
text: The dogs are reacting to something!!!
Hearing the barking of the demonic dogs, UFS soldiers and Armed Refugees appeared right away.

name: Armed Refugee (Me)
text: Shit!! Everyone, prepare to fight!! Let's break through them!!!
